labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: First embed would not have an image
data.expected_result: Both embeds to display the same image
data.short_description: Embedded images are not displayed if their link is a redirect
data.steps_to_repro: - create an embed with the link "<https://discordapp.com/api/users/118454446849130499/avatars/1ccb95ba31e13807c9138b9c0ed753e6.jpg>" - create another embed with the link: "<https://images.discordapp.net/avatars/118454446849130499/1ccb95ba31e13807c9138b9c0ed753e6.jpg>" (they both point to the same picture)
